data: Lælius Lamia, born in Italy of illustrious parents, had not yet discarded the toga prætexta when he set out for the schools of Athens to study philosophy.
Lælius Lamia, born in Italy of illustrious parents, had not yet discarded the _toga prætexta_ when he set out for the schools of Athens to study philosophy.
